https://tmrev.io/movie/655568-Capriccio 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4YdGhpRit9KDf6NJmHiHggkR0BF.jpg Richard Strauss' last stage work is an opera about opera as an art form, depicting the creation of a music drama in a wise and witty way. Which came first the words or the music? That is the question Strauss and his librettist Clemens Krauss address through the story of a Countess torn between a composer and a poet. Capriccio
